Looking forward to the next Space Marshals!

I love this game. It‚Äôs completely offline, and, almost no micro transactions. Although you can buy another mission pack, I haven‚Äôt. Very fun to play. The collectible tokens are well hidden, but not impossible. You have a variety of unique weapons at your disposal. Want to go out with a bang? Grab a grenade launcher. Prefer to take a stealthy approach? Grab a silent crossbow. Tons of unique gameplay mechanics and gadgets. This game also takes stealth seriously. You can preform silent stealth takedowns, and ambushes can do up to 3x the damage. Would definitely get.
This is the game that deserves 5 star!

This is, by far, one of the best adventure games out there. It provides just enough instruction and you know your mission. So many of these games now, you run around and have no idea, at all, what it is that you are supposed to be doing. The only con is that you apparently can‚Äôt pause, or save exactly where you are at in your mission, so you have to start the mission over. But it is good practice and provides an opportunity to improve your skills. Worth the money and there is no hassle in-app purchases, except to get Ava‚Äôs mission pack so you can play a woman Marshall. Extremely happy with this purchase. Will look forward to more. I updated this and downgraded a point. The Ava mission pack is rather disappointing. The very 1st mission is exceedingly more difficult than the overall game. So much so that I teeter on the border of giving it a very pejorative label.

title.label: One of the best games I‚Äôve ever played

content.label: I bought this game, tried it for 10 minutes, then gave up.  Months later, I tried again and put in a real honest effort to learn it.  Then it clicked and I was in love.  I‚Äôve played 100s of games, and this (along with Space Marshalls 1), is among the best games I‚Äôve ever played.  I never play a game more than once (that‚Äôs how I roll) but I keep coming back to play this one and its predecessor.  This one is a bit better and more polished, but they are both great.

title.label: Great game series with excellent replay value

content.label: These games are a mix of action, adventure, and problem solving. Most of the missions require a stealth approach until better weapons and armor is unlocked. Overall, a ton of fun. I‚Äôve replayed all three installments several times!

I never write reviews on this App Store. I usually just play, enjoy, then move on. However, for this game, I need to share my experience. First off I bought this game about a year ago and just never opened it because for me it was an impulsive buy. I felt so dumb in hindsight because this game is amazing. It has combat, stealth, witty writing, solid animation, solid frame rates, wonderful gameplay mechanics, and each mission feels unique and different. Missions don‚Äôt feel repetitive, they did a great job with diversity in the objectives and goals for each individual mission that pops up in the game. I never wanted to stop playing this game. In fact, as soon as I finished the main game I bought Ava‚Äôs additional missions. It was a phenomenal experience and honestly I‚Äôm jealous of you if you‚Äôre reading this and you haven‚Äôt bought it yet because you can live the experience of it from the beginning again with no expectations. 
In summary, buy this game.
- Yonkers, New York 
Signing off

Or maybe they were hired by a company giving them a ton of money. I donno. This is the best iPhone game ever made.

First of all this is a good game in the last mission in Evas Storia park there‚Äôs a glitch that the last mission if you don‚Äôt get too close u can pick up tami and leave I love this game just fix that glitch and will be even more awesome PS I love the Cheeky places that the co-v tokens are hidden it‚Äôs just a really funny when you discover the one at the gathering Herod this is not a new review I‚Äôm using the same old one to say that do you really think that no one could find the co-v token at the gathering hrod I love the armor that lets you regenerate Health

The Einsteins that came up with this game did awesom it is my favorite game and there is no better game if u like guns grenades and action. I just wish the campaign was longer and that there were updates the first one didn't this game was worth every penny thank u people that made this game u did great.

Pixelbite you did it again! I loved the first one and this one is no different! I love the quality and creativity of the game! I love the different guns and other weapons and grenades etc. The Ava Mission pack was amazing! It answered a lot of unanswered questions like where Blackburn and the Artemis ended up. The Ava mission pack also just changed the concept because Ava does not have lots of fire power and relies on more stealthy techniques.

                      SPOILER ALERT!!!

The time traveling aspect with the Volitilium Bomb was also very cool! I love all the aspects of the first and second one. I would love an update to the game since the last one was almost a year ago or maybe even a Space Marshals 3? Please let me know (in the developer response section) if you are going to update the game or create a Space Marshals 3!! I love both of them and would hate to see you give up on the games!

How amazing it would be if you make such a game with completely western theme, or maybe s stealth theme such as Hitman or Velvet Assassin. The thing is this simple classic concept of a game and controls is the best, no matter how gaming companies try to be innovative but really the classic concept always proves best.
This has been an amazing game and I love it so much that I‚Äôve restarted the game multiple times

I was happy to play the game. For once I can play a stealth game where it isn‚Äôt ‚Äústealth‚Äù (when the best option is to make sure no one is alive to see you instead of making sure no one sees you) because the enemies are challenging. Also the gunplay is great, as it does more damage the longer you line up the shot (for all guns the damage increases as the cone decreases in size, you can have the bullet miss but still do damage if the enemy is partly in the cone) while aiming more carefully does not increase dps it can be used one shot guards like when fighting the gray water cronies they will run to cover and sound an alarm when shot. The best part about the gunplay is the cover mechanics. It feels nice to shoot a grunt, then dodging bullets until I get to that precious rock I have been crouched behind for the past ten minutes looking for a good guide (I never did this but it is hard)

Sound
The guns sound really good for a mobile game, and the machine gun sounds so good I use it over a better laser machine gun because bullets sons better. The music on the other hand is not good. I usually listen to other music while playing this.

Graphics+Animations 
The look of the game is very good and I like the alpine looking maps. My least favorite looks are the cave levels as the lighting is kind of bad. I also would like to have a more western style with maybe a dead eye or voice action that sounds like a cowboy for the next installment. The animation is good to I don‚Äôt really have much to say about it besides how burton slouches while running with the pistol. Really his leg movement seems unnatural and exaggerated. But it only makes burton feel off while in hubs because with so many things going during missions on it‚Äôs difficult to notice. 

AI (artificial intelligence)
The enemies act very smart as they do not just think the wind sent a 22 caliber through their friend‚Äôs skull (looking at you Skyrim). With all jokes aside the enemies have different ways to either fight or flee from you. The enemies always give chase when they see you, even for a split second, and when the don‚Äôt (Rattlers don‚Äôt more often, but you have a better chance to ignore it if they only hear it not see it) they have an excuse like their shift is almost over  or they are too lazy. The rattlers mainly use pistols shotguns and sub machine guns (there are three types, Adam guys stronger guys with shields and ones that buff nearby soldiers. The shotgun users fire off in the direction that you were last seen hoping to hit you in instead of the pistol wielding grunts who walk to where you were ready to fire the next time you decide to show your face. The sub machine gunners tend to either  to create space or charge at you while firing at you last known position. It makes fighting guys with shotguns and machine guns more fun, as you are co stably getting shot at instead of catching guys attention only to get in range of your six shooter. The last enemies for the Rattlers are these big guys who use green lasers (I do not know what green lasers do but red ones go through shields) and they shoot wildly basically everywhere after getting shot at. Once they end their hissy fit they charge at you (watch out as they are the fastest enemies) The graywater soldiers are the same except they trade out the health buffing guys with invisible guys (found out Rattlers have invisible guys to) they act like Machine gunners but they only advance. The gray water guys are scary to fight as they use red and green lasers. Lasers can be seen by enemies from across the map, drawing attention to unwanted guests. Also the big guys for graywater use shot guns that go through shields. They are by far the toughest in the game. 

Final thoughts
I had a lot of fun playing this game and I hope they make a new one
